function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited focus on the impact of COVID-19 on the built environment in scientific literature","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of how COVID-19 affects the built environment, leading to ineffective preventive measures","Mitigation":"Conduct more focused research on the impact of COVID-19 on the built environment and its implications for preventive measures","Technologies":"Advanced data analysis tools for studying the impact of COVID-19 on the built environment","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increased consumption of energy, water, and cleaning products in service units","Impact":"Greater environmental impact due to increased resource consumption","Mitigation":"Implement sustainable practices and technologies to reduce energy and water consumption, and minimize the use of cleaning products","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, water-efficient fixtures, and eco-friendly cleaning products","People":"Owners and operators of service units","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations"}]}
